00030 #include "SimpleUniformSourcePde.hpp"
00031 
00032 template<unsigned DIM>
00033 SimpleUniformSourcePde<DIM>::SimpleUniformSourcePde(double coefficient)
00034     : mCoefficient(coefficient)
00035 {
00036 }
00037 
00038 template<unsigned DIM>
00039 double SimpleUniformSourcePde<DIM>::ComputeConstantInUSourceTerm(const ChastePoint<DIM>& rX)
00040 {
00041     return 0.0;
00042 }
00043 
00044 template<unsigned DIM>
00045 double SimpleUniformSourcePde<DIM>::ComputeLinearInUCoeffInSourceTerm(const ChastePoint<DIM>& rX, Element<DIM,DIM>* pElement)
00046 {
00047     return mCoefficient;
00048 }
00049 
00050 template<unsigned DIM>
00051 c_matrix<double,DIM,DIM> SimpleUniformSourcePde<DIM>::ComputeDiffusionTerm(const ChastePoint<DIM>& rX)
00052 {
00053     return identity_matrix<double>(DIM);
00054 }
